name: add_text_to_image
description: Add text overlay to an image with customizable font, size, color, and position.

image_path.description: Path to the input image file

text.description: Text to add to the image

position.description: Position (x, y) where to place the text

font_color.description: Font color (hex color or color name)

font_name.description: Font name or path to font file

background_color.description: Background color for text box (hex color or color name)

output_path.description: Path for the output image. If not provided, will create auto-named file.
